name: Attack Of UNDO Zai
description:
Human beings have uncontrolled destruction of the earth' resources, Aliens had sent Angle - Undo Zai to implement the fifth extinction of the earth. This is the final test for humanity.

Defend Our World
4 player need to work together to protect our world from invasion of UNDO Zai. With 4 different ability characters and skills, player can play as a team to help each other challenge the game.

Small Indie Game

  • Single player shooting and challenge the normal or survival game mode.
  • Multiplayer - 2 to 4 Player team PC shooting game, high definition furry anime characters in a non-stop action shooter.

GAME FEATURES

  • Fantasy 3D character art and animation in a non-stop action shooting and dodge attack.
  • Single or team with 4 Player for the game challenge with 4 different title map.
  • Normal battle mode and survival battle mode for challenge

Steam Matchmaking and Lobbies

Steam's peer to peer matchmaking API is built around to concept of a lobby can have up to 250 users in it and set of functions that enable users to find other users to play a game with. More information can visit https://partner.steamgames.com/doc/features/multiplayer/matchmaking
